title: Stunning 9th Floor 2 Bedroom in New Luxury Building
posting_body: ['If you\'ve been wondering, "What\'s up with the shiny new building overlooking Maria Hernandez Park?"', 'Introducing 260 Knickerbocker, a stylish development in the heart of Bushwick features an elevator, gym, laundry, bike storage, private parking and rooftop with surreal views of Manhattan & BK.', 'Two evenly sized bedrooms sit on opposite sides and all rooms have wonderful natural light w/ a sweeping panorama of Bushwick.', 'Central a/c, ample closet space &', 'deep soaking tub!', 'In-person showings now!', 'Central A/C', 'High Ceilings', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Video Intercom', 'Natural Light in Living Area', 'Elevator', 'Laundry in building', 'Bike storage', 'Gym', 'Wheelchair Accessible', 'Private parking', 'Office space', 'Shared workspace', 'Outdoor Space', 'Common courtyard', 'Roof access', 'Skyline view', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Dishwasher', 'Stone countertops', '*Note there are currently tenants', "so I'd have to schedule showings at least 24 hours in advance!", 'Text Leo at 212-470-8830-470-8830 to schedule a viewing!', 'Thanks!', 'If you want to inquire about the apartment, send me a text with the following:', 'Name', 'Move in date', 'Income', 'Credit', 'Link to this apartment', 'I work for Nooklyn and can show you any apartment on their site.', 'No need to look for another agent =) Feel free to send me a text with:', 'Move in date:', 'Budget:', 'Bedrooms:', 'Amenities:', 'Areas:', 'Looking forward to hearing from you!', 'Thank you =)']
